funding-group.funding-statement: The EMINI study was funded by two grants from the European Union (SANTE/2004/078-545/130 and SANTE/2006/129-931). The serology sub-study was supported by the German Federal Ministry of Education and Research (BMBF), grant no. 01KA0903. The funders had no role in study design, data collection and analysis, decision to publish, or preparation of the manuscript.
